title: Meet Our Organizer Team
description: We're a group of passionate individuals gathering the community of people passionate about Speed of User Experience, AKA Web Performance. We're always looking for volunteers to join us on this noble journey!

team.title: Lead Organizer
team.name: Sergey Chernyshev
team.description: MCs the events, finds speakers, buys geekaway items, and makes everything else happen.

team.title: Meet4SPEED Lead
team.name: Paul Calvano
team.description: Leads the hands-on analysis and optimization workshops called 'Meet4SPEED'.

team.title: Event Coordinator
team.description: Meet and greet attendees, order and organize the food for the event, spread swag for members, and be friendly.

team.title: Video Operator
team.name: Alex Chernyshev
team.description: Sets up and uses video recording equipment to record speaker events for our YouTube channel, wires up speakers with microphones, and manages footage.

team.title: Video Editor
team.name: Nik Chernyshev
team.description: Edits speaker session footage and publishes the resulting videos to our YouTube channel.

team.title: Social Media Manager
team.description: Post to our various social media platforms, send email announcements, and spread the word.

team.title: Speaker Manager
team.description: Manage speaker search, coordinate speakers, collect and post their information, and coordinate dates with the venues.

team.title: Venue Coordinator
team.description: Find venues that can host our hands-on (small) and speaker (larger) events, maintain venue list, and make sure we have a place to meet.

team.title: Sponsorship Manager
team.description: Find sponsors, collect their money and coordinate asset deliverables, and post sponsor information according to their sponsorship level.
